title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 25 Barri Palomeres
description: picnic area

title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 9 Carrer de Roger de Flor
title_short: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 9 Carrer de Roger de Flor
description: Free parking and overnight stay on car park. Would only suggest staying for one night as it is frequently patrolled and monitored by local police. Very close to beach, bars and restaurants.

title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 19 Camí de la Pomereda
title_short: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - 19 Camí de la Pomereda
description: Online parking at the foot of the beach, quite flat and many spaces. There is a campsite nearby and that's it, perfect for being alone, although a lot of people walk by.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 5 Carrer Marina
description:
Has no services, to spend the night.
5 min from the beach and shopping area.
There is a prohibition sign in all of Santa Susana but if you notify the local police they will tell you where

name: Camping del Mar
title: (08380) Camping del Mar
description:
Campsite of El mar.
Friendly welcome, by the sea. All the services for motorhomes.
Pitches 8x8m. Very well maintained toilets. Very quite campsite.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre
description: Ground parking, you can park day and night, only parking vehicles above 3500 Kg and buses are prohibited.

address.street: 22 Carrer del Pla de la Torre

name: Càmping El Pla de Mar
title: (08380) Càmping El Pla de Mar
description: Malgrat de Mar, Camí de la Pomereda. Camping Del Mar, small family campsite with all services, pool, restaurant, etc ... Direct access to the beach. Right location for motorhomes over 7 m.

name: Camping Resort Els Pins
title: (08380) Camping Resort Els Pins
description: Mar y sol is a small campsite, mainly locals and permanent campers, shower with hot water, electricity, toilets (clean), chemical junk, bar. 20 m from the beach.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 66 Camí del Mig
description: Parking reserved for motorhomes

name: Càmping Bon Repòs
title: (08398) Càmping Bon Repòs
description: The place borders directly on the sea. A railway line to Barcelona runs between the campsite and the village. A pool and children's activities are available. There is a restaurant and a small supermarket on the square. Fresh baguettes in the morning and many everyday items on offer. There are other supermarkets in the nearby town. There is a large old pine forest with shaded pitches as well as sunny pitches closer to the beach. The subsoil is compacted gravel. No height limit. Suitable for mobile homes up to 10 m. Spanish, English and German are spoken at the reception. The electricity is free. 10 A are supplied.

title: (08389) Palafolls - 3 Les Conquilles
description: Quiet place next to the town, supermarket and outlet stores nearby.

name: Càmping El Pinar Platja
title: (08398) Càmping El Pinar Platja
description: At the beach!

name: Camping Capfun Tordera-Nacions
title: (08380) Camping Capfun Tordera-Nacions
description: Malgrat de Mar, Unnamed Road. Camping La Tordera

title: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - Camí de la Tordera
title_short: (08380) Malgrat de Mar - Camí de la Tordera
description: Parking in front of the campsite. In these dates and for a night without problems. Many mosquitoes No service

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - S/N Carrer dels Pins
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - S/N Carrer dels Pins
description: Beach Parking. No parking from 8 p.m. to 9 a.m.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - Carrer de Joan Maragall
title_short: (08398) Santa Susanna - Carrer de Joan Maragall
description: Huge, relatively new free day and night parking space. No services though. Lidl nearby. Two minutes walk to restaurants and bars

title: (08398) Barcelona - s/n Passeig Marítim
description: Beach front piece of land in between two hotels. Beach footpath along the sea front. This free car park is on the beach with patches of grass where motorhomes park without a problem. It is also used as a coach park for holiday coaches. Dogs not allowed on the beach but footpath nice & wide allowing good dog walking. No services just bins. There is a car park a short distance away that prohibits motorhomes overnight, this us clearly signposted, so don’t confuse the two. The police drive along the seafront, no interest in motorhomes only fining dogs on the beach.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 28 Carrer Montagut
description: Dead end street, quiet, surrounded by a residential area. There is a church nearby and at 10pm bells were heard, I don't know if because of the curfew. At nine in the morning they rang again. Just at that time we left, it began to fill with cars, because there were some food stalls next to it. In the surroundings there are several openings all of land. There is the library and a few km a lidl and a carrefour.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 30 Carrer Salvador Espriu
description: Parking very shady at this time ATTENTION to the height but space wide enough to stand (3 m high for our ducato) point water front park for child. For night OK

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 37 Carrer del Bou
description: Parking next to a playground in the middle of nature.

name: Camping Oasis
title: (08398) Camping Oasis
description: “Camping Oasis” clean, secure, friendly people.  150 m walk to beach.  100 m walk to train station with service to Girona and Barcelona about 1 hour train ride.  Easy access for camper van. Not certain about larger vehicles. Lots of options of small houses. Looks like they may be expanding.

title: (08389) Palafolls - 28 Carrer Camí del Castell
description: Small parking lot at a very beautiful castle ruins you can visit (no museum or something ... you can move freely) Very beautiful all-round view. the road is tarmacked, sometimes a bit tight for bigger cars, no problem for vans. We did not stay here but it did not seem like there were any problems.

title: (17300) Blanes - 44B Avinguda Vila de Madrid
description: Free parking out of season. Close to the sea. Pay period between 15/06-15/09, 9:00-20:00. Long camping cars need to pay double places. Calm place between the campings. No water and toilet.

title: (17300) Blanes - 42 Avinguda Vila de Madrid
description: Quiet parking, little traffic, only serves the adjacent campsites.

name: Càmping El Pinar
title: (17300) Càmping El Pinar
description: Campsite Pinar Blanes has everything your heart desires: small shop, restaurant, bar, friendly staff. Direct beach places. nice, short, safe bike path to Blanes.

name: Camping Voramar
title: (17300) Camping Voramar
description:
Camping Voramar.
It is a small, familiar and quiet campsite, with few free camping spots, and many permanent bungalows and caravans.
Good pool and direct access to the sea.
the staff very friendly.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - 5 Urbanitzacio Can Batlle
description: Public car park with around 25 spaces with trees in a residential area, flat terrain, without services.

name: Camping Bella Terra
title: (17300) Camping Bella Terra
description: Campsite Bella Terra with large, delimited pitches, quiet and above all with sanitary facilities as we do not often see (this is even the first time that we have seen such clean and functional, even in France). To recommend with eyes closed. Be careful when arriving, the main access is on the left.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
description: Parking on the beach.  Just park for free.  There is a shower on the beach.

title: (08389) Mas Carbó - 22 Carrer Emilia Pardo Bazán
title_short: (08389) Mas Carbó - 22 Carrer Emilia Pardo Bazán
description: Water fountain at the playground. (Probably tap water) Next to a residential area

name: Càmping Blanes
title: (17300) Càmping Blanes
description: Small campsite in an idyllic location right by the sea. Very spacious parking spaces under trees. It becomes difficult for long vehicles, as we have seen. Direct beach access with code. Located at the end of the beach promenade. Small shop and snack bar on the square. The place with shops can be reached on foot.

title: (08398) Santa Susanna - N-II
description: Galp gas station with water

name: Càmping Solmar
title: (17300) Càmping Solmar
description: Blanes, 48 ​​Carrer Cristòfor Colom. Camping Solmar, not suitable for motorhomes, no service area. No tap water, no dedicated drain. 300 meters from the beaches, close to shops (exit of the campsite), swimming pool, wifi (paying). Sanitary very clean and cleaned very regularly. I think this campsite, probably very good elsewhere, has no place in an application dedicated to motorhomes. In addition, locations too narrow.

name: Camping Cavall de Mar
title: (17300) Camping Cavall de Mar
description: It is the Camping Cavall de Mar and it is small and very quiet

name: Camping LaMasia
title: (17300) Camping LaMasia
description: Camping LaMasia very expensive limited pitch, I have an 8 meter motorhome he put on a 7 meter pitch I put myself through, so it was not possible to put my awning on, in the evening I wanted to take a shower!

title: (17300) Blanes - 40 Passeig de s'Abanell
description: Parking on the beach, free from September to June! No supply and disposal, but garbage cans nearby. Parking spaces all the way down the street. Stay clean!

title: (17300) Blanes - 1 Plaça Badajoz
description: Water point next to the play area, I don't know if it is totally drinkable

name: Càmping S'Abanell
title: (17300) Càmping S'Abanell
description: Camping s'abanell, a bit noisy, but they still have some places when the other campsites are full. Good for a few nights. 2 steps from the sea and the city center

title: (17300) Blanes - 12 Carrer d'Ernest Lluch
description: Public free parking 15 minutes walk from the beach, very noisy in July during the carnival.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 39 Carrer Consolat de Mar
description: Parking of Santa susana beach, wide limited to 2, 20 m

title: (17300) Blanes - 19 Carrer d'Antoni Gaudí
description: Nice free location close to beach and town. nice restaurants and shops. beautiful boulevard 5 minutes walk. no services but 11 official motorhome pitches, but there are more in the surrounding large parking lot.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
description: Located in the hills, great views of the city and the sea! At the top and at the bottom of a small residential area! Super quiet, the birds sing ... there are even mountain trails departures! Certainly inaccessible in high season! There can be 2/3 places for maximum vans.

title: (17300) Blanes - 5 Carrer Josep Tarradellas
description: Self-service laundry

title: (17300) Blanes - 89 Carrer de les Gavarres
description: Great public parking for day and night. Asphalted. Residential area and near the police station. It is not possible to get things out but calm and safe. 15 minutes walk from the beach.

title: (17300) Blanes - 6240 Carrer del Primer de Maig
title_short: (17300) Blanes - 6240 Carrer del Primer de Maig
description: Car wash for motorhomes, campers, has a walkway to wash the roofs, solar panels, skylights, etc ...

title: (17300) Blanes - 136 Carretera Accés Costa Brava
description: Service area of garage has water for fill up.

title: (17300) Blanes - 1 Carrer d'Antoni Palau i Verdera
title_short: (17300) Blanes - 1 Carrer d'Antoni Palau i Verdera
description: Water point

title: (17300) Blanes - 1 Carrer Mas Guelo
description: Large gravel/dirt parking lot, plenty of space for large motorhomes. Between 2 busy roads, but bearable at night. It feels pretty safe because it's lit and lively. Ideal for an overnight stay. Police drives stiffness. Significantly better than the parking lot next to it with large ruts and little space. Decathlon and consum 300m away.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24 Carrer Tarragona
description:
Access only by online registration on our website.

Only for motorhomes.

Guarded area in the city center with all services (electricity, water, gray and black water, wifi, toilets and showers) 50m from the beach. Entrance of vehicles from 5 p.m. Reception: Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. and from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m.

title: (08490) Tordera - 25 Carrer de Maragall
description: Free dirt vacant lot without shade near the center. We have spent the night in a camper van and very calm (April). On Sundays there is a market nearby.

name: Camping Enmar
title: (08397) Camping Enmar
description:
Camping enmar. Very good staff at the reception. Good pool, nice parcels but sometimes narrow paths. Small supermarket. Sanitary makes a clear impression. Not far from the beach. Open from 07/03/21 to 01/10/21 for next year 07/03/22 to 01/11/22
New: heated swimming pool during the months of low/mid season.

address.street: Avinguda Nuestra Señora de la Mercè

title: (17300) Blanes - 47 Avinguda de la Pau
description: Quiet and safe place to spend the night, it has a supermarket in front and you can go downtown on foot.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
description: Very large free car park with no bans to date. No shade. A few steps from the sea and even if the railway line no noise. No service but very quiet. The pedestrian street is 600m away

title: (08490) Tordera - 13 Carrer Roger de Llúria
description: A big and free parking space close to the center of the city. Just one road passing by so it is pretty quiet. Separated trash bins are next to the road, 50m from the parking space

name: Camping El Camell
title: (08397) Camping El Camell
description: Family campsite, pleasant, very good reception and very friendly. They solve any problems you may have. Near the beach.

title: (17300) Blanes - s/n Carrer Cardenal Vidal i Barraquer
title_short: (17300) Blanes - s/n Carrer Cardenal Vidal i Barraquer
description:
Parking lot at the Castell de Sant Joan
The parking lots are all slanted but we were able to stand reasonably straight in the parking lot in the middle and sleep well.
With a wide view over the city and mountains. From the ruin (free of charge) you have a panoramic view also to the sea. At the castle there is also a watering place.

We arrived at 8pm, shortly after the last visitors left the castle and we had a quiet night.

address.street: s/n Carrer Cardenal Vidal i Barraquer

title: (08490) Tordera - 29 Carretera Fogars
description: Public parking in the town of Tordera with restaurants and supermarkets opposite. Near the historic center. You cannot stay overnight on Saturdays because on Sunday the village market is held there.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 89 Carrer Segrià
description: Place with a lot of space to park with vans with a view of the sea, shade and quiet

name: Camping Bellsol
title: (08397) Camping Bellsol
description:
Pineda de Mar, 38 Passeig Maritim.
Campsite Bell Sol. short stopover in this campsite with our 2 young children. We were put towards the bottom, very quiet, medium sized parking spot. Big swimming pool, we don't have time for all activities. But all services available. the beach at 100 m. One downside, the traffic lanes are narrow, especially for turning... but with a good driver (motorhome 7 m long by 3 m high) and patience, you get to your destination!

title: (17300) Blanes - 18 Carrer de la Cala
description: Level parking in an urbanization. Very quiet night. Although it is next to the road, at night only a vehicle passes from time to time. Being the battery, large motorhomes may not fit.

title: (17300) Blanes - 18B Carrer Cala St Francesc
description: Small car park on the side of the road to stop and eat with a magnificent view

title: (08490) Tordera - Carrer Estacio
description: Large stadium parking, next to service area, unusable unloadable drain platform (flooded), plus a lot of noise, music, very good night

title: (17300) Blanes - 9 Passeig Bitácora
description: Free parking from 20 to 9 o'clock. Paid during the day. Near the Cala Francesc. Very quiet and you can go straight to the beach to pay for your place.

name: Camping Caballo de Mar
title: (08397) Camping Caballo de Mar
description:
Camping Caballo de Mar. It is not a large campsite but it has all the services of a large campsite without crowds. Loading and unloading of water. Beach 1 minute away and close to Calella and Pineda de Mar.
Swimming pool, water slides, children's pool, sports area and entertainment.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
description: Ample ground parking. Many parking lots, close to the center.

title: (08490) Tordera - Carrer Estacio
description: The Motorhome area in Tordera, is located just 5 minutes walk from the town center, has almost all the services, it is also surrounded by nature, right next to a park so that the little ones can enjoy nature, in addition It has a barbecue area and community pool for the summer, on Sundays they have a market and it is very large. There is also a community scale in case you want to weigh the air conditioner. At least for our huge SAT system, it is not possible to find an Astra satellite because of the trees. Internet is almost impossible in this area. Driving cars throw up a lot of dust. We are disappointed with the supply and disposal facility. It is not accessible for large motorhomes with a storage tank.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 144 Carrer Llavaneres
description: Parking with beautiful views, we stopped here after looking for a quiet place. Be careful the climb is tough.

title: (08370) Pineda de Mar - 28 Carrer Lloret
description:
Small platform at the turn of the road, beautiful view of the sea and the city. Quiet and calm corner, little car traffic.
perfect for one night.

title: (08370) Calella - 3 Carretera d'Hortsavinyà
description: Free unsupervised parking lot have taken the parking lot as a resting place for the market. Way to the beach approx. 1.5 km. Many cozy places between bamboo where you can stand. Motorhomes are not allowed other night there are lights and dark shaded areas with bamboo.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 50 Avinguda Boadella
description: Parking at the top of Sa Boadella beach. ONLY if you like you park here for 1 Night. not REALY Nice along the road with 2 vans. see photo of 2 vans. 1 min walk the Nice view of cape. not ok for camper model fridge! sorry.

title: (08490) Urbanización Tordera Parc - 126 Carrer la Manxa
title_short: (08490) Urbanización Tordera Parc - 126 Carrer la Manxa
description: Quiet and great place, the town hall and the neighbors allow overnight stays, close to mountain bike trails and hiking trails.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar -
description: This beach is awesome. A short walk (10 minutes) takes you to the sand, an ideal place for a picnic. There is a beach bar where you eat quite well. It is forbidden to sleep there, the police arrive late at night and early in the morning.

title: (17300) Les Planes - Unnamed Road
description: Access only for van, location at the edge of the track. Very quiet and rising sun.

title: (08370) Calella - 94 Carrer de Sant Jaume
description: Automatic launderette next to a petrol station.

name: Càmping Tucan
title: (17310) Càmping Tucan
description: Camping Tucan, good pool especially for children, good plots at the start of the campsite. small farm. bathrooms and shower ok. Nearby supermarkets. bus stop in front.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 22 Avinguda de Fenals
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 22 Avinguda de Fenals
description: Streets of white zone to park, 5 minutes from access to beach and trails.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar -
description: Parking lot that is often used during the day for walks in the forest. Located in front of a now unused golf course. It is often used by motocross riders on nice days. Quiet in the evening. Normally standing there for one or two nights is no problem. No thoroughfare. The road is unpaved but wide and easy to drive on. The last picture is taken about 200 m further, I could actually turn around well with my vehicle a concrete gully there is no people at all and I slept very well.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 48 Avinguda Passapera
description: Large paid parking lot (prices quite cheap 24h/24€) you can drive on it with a camper and mobile home without any worries. The car park is secured 24 hours a day by staff. If you park at the edge of the parking lot, you may hear the hotel visitors, but we were able to spend a very nice, quiet night there

name: Camping Santa Elena Ciutat
title: (17310) Camping Santa Elena Ciutat
description: Camping Santa Elena with all amenities: Pool Bar, Restaurant/Bar, Supermarket, Barbecue Area, Mini Golf, Entertainment Small and large plots from 19.90 euros (acsi card accepted). 1.5 km walk from the city center and 900m from the beach. Open exceptionally for this year until November 6, 2022.

title: (08370) Calella - 1 Zona Afores
description: Large, very flat sandy parking lot, 300 meters from the beach and 100 from the Calella lighthouse, with GR paths. And close to the population, camping is NOT allowed, be responsible with the environment, please, if they give us access, let's take care of it!

title: (17310) Condado del Jaruco -
description: Nice place quiet but bad path only 4x4!

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Small rest area by the road, with splendid views. A little road noise. No camping, do not unpack anything, thank you!

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carrer de Plató
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carrer de Plató
description:
Parking lot without facilities. No prohibition signs and one of the few places where you can park along a road. Also available for larger motorhomes. At about 20 to 25 minutes walking distance from the beach of Lloret. Close to a large supermarket and several eateries. Like all other places in Lloret de Mar, it is of course a matter of luck. In the end we did not stay overnight ourselves, but we were able to park for free until 9:30 PM, after we were refused as a camper at 2 paid parking facilities.

Note: as a camper you are absolutely not welcome at paid parking spaces that are secured.

name: Càmping Bonavista
title: (08395) Càmping Bonavista
description: Calella, Carrer de Sant Jaume. Campsite Bonavista. Family campsite. Lots of trees, close to the sea, easy access by road. Very nice staff and welcome. We will definitely come back for weekends.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Carrer Modest Cuixart
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Carrer Modest Cuixart
description: Free parking day and night for water word guests no service but quiet for the night against many mosquitoes

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Viewpoint of Platja de Roca Grossa, quiet place with a magnificent view of the sea. Night prohibited on the coast. Camping prohibited, please do not unpack anything.

name: CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
title: (08370) CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
description: Camping Roca Grossa is a terraced campsite, a small train takes you up and down the campsite. It has a restaurant, grocery, swimming pool, tennis, toilets. Plot of size with more or less seen on the sea. Access to the sea (small cove with small pebble and not sand) is made by bridges to cross road and train. pay wifi

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 21 Carrer de Sòcrates
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 21 Carrer de Sòcrates
description: Pitch for 1-2 nights ok.  Not too quiet but safe.  Space for 2 campers as space is used by local residents.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - s/n Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - s/n Avinguda de les Alegries
description:
LIDL car parks, about thirty places are in the open area (therefore no height limit) but the rest are underground.
Parking very good for visiting Lloret, we stayed there from morning to evening without fear of being robbed because there is a lot of traffic in this car park.
Totally free.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 37 Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 37 Avinguda de les Alegries
description: Huge parking lot of well leveled sand, Free Day Very quiet.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 9 Carrer Bisbe Bernat Umbert
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 9 Carrer Bisbe Bernat Umbert
description: Parking monitored 24 hours a day. Do not take out table and chairs. Shady place

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 10 Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 10 Avinguda de les Alegries
description: Well arrived in Lloret de mar with great pleasure. blue squares everywhere and this place and still in white square, ideal for this walk. Ideal for van

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Avinguda de les Alegries
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 11 Avinguda de les Alegries
description: Parking in front of a shopping center with a supermarket. Restrooms are available in the mall when it is open. About 20 parking spaces.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 191 Avinguda de Vidreres
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 191 Avinguda de Vidreres
description: We parked next to the market and slept

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 79 Carrer Joan Miró
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 79 Carrer Joan Miró
description:
At the back of Aldi...just a little lane sheltered from the cold in the winter...
quiet and no one bothered me.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Avinguda de les Regions
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Avinguda de les Regions
description: Laundry service

name: Camping LLoret Blau
title: (17310) Camping LLoret Blau
description: We spent 4 nights online reservation paid 30%, if you go directly you may not find a free place, very crowded, quite expensive this campsite 250eur, 2 adults 2 children caravan 6.4m, electricity included at the price above, 11eur electricity per day  .  The reason we stayed for several days was personally to meet up with family staying in a hotel near this campsite and to spend some time together and for a safe area for the campervan.  I spent most of the time in the city, so I did not benefit from the swimming pool or children's playground, etc., the location is near the beach, almost 10 minutes on foot, the price of food in the center for 4 people is about 60 euros  at a restaurant .  In the campsite you have a small market, you can find fresh bread and fresh croissants in the morning and some food, there is also a small restaurant but I didn't eat.  Showers and toilet area look old but acceptable in terms of cleanliness , when it is full in the week and with young people it is a mess in the toilet area, a lot of dust when a car is moving and a lot of ants, you must have powder for the little insects   , are  everywhere.  The gray water is poured at the entrance next to reception, the chemical toilet is located next to the toilets.  I don't regret staying, not other option in my case  but it is a very expensive campsite for the quality it looks like.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 32 Carrer de l'Aiguaviva
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 32 Carrer de l'Aiguaviva
description: Battery vehicle parking. No services. Maximum 6m, or 6.50 if you cantilever towards the sidewalk, which is wide. Slight lateral tilt. Attached to the Lloret campsite.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - Av. de Vidreres
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - Av. de Vidreres
description: Clay lot, 23mins from the beach.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 58 GI-682
description: Laundry with possibility of changing money (payment only by cash). Laundry and also

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Carrer dels Ferrers
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 16 Carrer dels Ferrers
description: Sandy free parking. To access it is a high neighborhood it can cost a bit to climb if the vehicle is heavy. It has views of the town and a quiet place in the middle of the summer season. If you want to go to the town you have to walk a while.

title: (08495) -
description: Parking of the paddle court, at night there is no one, although there are some lights on the court sleep well

title: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
title_short: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
description: Picnic area with tables next to a church. There is a bicycle lane called the Tourdera.

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta
description: Area by the side of a forest track. Enough space for 2/3 small vans, easy access. More spaces along the rest of the track too. Nice and shaded under pines and strawberry trees

address.street: Camí de Sant Cebrià de Vallalta

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 24 Camí Antic de Tossa
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 24 Camí Antic de Tossa

title: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
title_short: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
description: Dirt road of little traffic of people. Quiet area a few minutes from paved road.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
description:
Free water point.
Good parking facilities around.

title: (17310) -
description: Water point

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 31 BV-5128
description: Parking next to a soccer field. Free weekends and holidays. We slept two nights with no problem. No  prohibition sign. 5 min walk from the beach

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
description: Free sand parking in front of a company (industrial area next to a water court). Ideal to spend a night in the calm and the freshness of the trees (shade accessible by motorhome). Attention, the parking fills in the early morning hours of employees' vehicles. No service.

name: Camping la Maresma
title: (08395) Camping la Maresma
description: Small campsite just 800m from the beach

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
description: Great esplanade in the same town next to the sports center

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 48 Carrer Salt del Sallent
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 48 Carrer Salt del Sallent
description: Dirt track, no problem with a van, but don’t bring you big motor home. Not much traffic at night, and no one seemed to bother us being here.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
description: Service station with free water tap available between the vacuum cleaners. Really great…

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 31 Carrer Amadeu Vives
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 31 Carrer Amadeu Vives
description: A quiet place... it's a parking lot, but we spent one night since we arrived in town very late and it was the only place we could find. It is a kind of dirt parking next to a ravine, recommended for one night and very punctual.

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 8 Carrer Ausias March
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 8 Carrer Ausias March
description: A good place to spend the day and spend the night. Sunny, quiet and in the same town. Land parking of the sports center.

title: (08470) Can Palau - Unnamed Road
description: Very good mountain water. Not much water pressure, so you should not be in a hurry when filling up your drink water.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 1 Carrer Azalea
description: It is a sandy parking lot right next to the road that at night there are almost no bakery cars just 20 meters away with garbage cans and swimming pool in the urbanization I would use it only to sleep and leave early

title: (17411) Lloret de Mar - 10 Avinguda Mil·lenni
description: Area next to the road, little traveled, and with an esplanade where you can park a large motorhome. there are more areas but only for van since the road is complicated. is next to something with a walk through it. you sleep well and it is a quiet area. valid for overnight

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
description: Nice places to take a break or spend a night. With access to the beach less than 50 m walk that goes under the national. (See the pictures). We spent one night on this car park and it's ok, just the national passing by. Especially practical if you have a large vehicle.

title: (17452) Massanes - 17 Carrer Josep Pla
description: Undeveloped industrial zone. Not nice but ok for one night. Quiet impasse.

title: (17452) Massanes - Carrer Pi
description: I live in the area and I see many motorhomes that park and spend a night. It pretended to be an industrial estate but there is only one for companies. space to maneuver some shadows ... although the trees are small. no services 20 minutes from the beach .. Blanes 30 min from the mountain ... Montseny

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 1 Avinguda Font de Sant Llorenç
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 1 Avinguda Font de Sant Llorenç
description: Parking spaced for all vehicles. Tarmac surface but sloping. No services on site. Plenty of room even in August. 10 min walk to the beach where you can acces showers and toilets

name: CÀMPING CANYELLES
title: (17310) CÀMPING CANYELLES
description: Camping Canyelles. Camping located on the hill of Canyelles. Pleasant ground with a beautiful view of the sea. Pool, supermarket, bar, very clean bathrooms even if a bit old. No road or city noise, the calm of the morning is really nice. A small train commutes between the high plots of the campsite and the beach, but a 5-minute walk is enough to get there. Beach very nice while the Costa Brava is armored in late July. Two nights with 2 children in tent plus electricity 99 euros. I recommend without hesitation

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 9 Avinguda Canyelles
description: Quiet location with a sandy floor. 200 meters to the beach. Restaurant on the beach

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carretera Cala Canyelles
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carretera Cala Canyelles
description: Great place right after on the beach

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Carrer Pau Casals
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Carrer Pau Casals
description:
Good place to stop for toilets, fuel and food along the highway! 
toilets are always a rare find...

title: (17450) Hostalric - Carrer Via Romana
description: Area to rest and spend the night next to the pavilion with children's area, tables and sports area. Restaurant within the sports complex. Very interesting to visit the Fortaleza- Castillo Hostalric. You can walk up.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 85 AP-7
description: Gas station, with water tap. It is located next to the fuel pumps. There is another faucet behind it but it doesn't work.

title: (17450) Hostalric - 24 Via Romana
description: Municipal parking in the center of the city, near the wall and restaurants and shops, very shady area

name: Camping Globo Barcelona
title: (08360) Camping Globo Barcelona
description:
Canet de Mar, 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla.
 1st category, very clean, generous pitches, low price close to Barcelona compared to prices in the area, French speaking staff. beautiful swimming pool supervised by lifeguard, surveillance of the campsite by security guard, quiet place.

address.street: 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla

name: Càmping Costa Dorada
title: (08360) Càmping Costa Dorada
description: Small and very familiar campsite, suitable for a camper van, the owner Gemma has helped us with all possible questions. Two adults, who rested and two children who did not stop bathing in the pool, in accordance with the new coronavirus measures. Clean sinks and clean showers. We will repeat on the safe route. From one night, let's go to be two because of the tranquility that was breathed.Two minutes from Tot Camping Canet physical store ,,, change the auxiliary battery that was failing me and continue the route super happy

title: (08359) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
title_short: (08359) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
description: A flat place in the woods next to a forest track. Quiet, shady place to spend the night after a day at the beach. In the morning someone passes by doing sports. It is recommended to access with a slightly elevated car. We agreed with a wolksvagen. Road not recommended for motorhomes and low cars.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 13 Cami de les Monges
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 13 Cami de les Monges
description: Very large esplanade to be able to make a stop both during the day and spend the night. Quiet. There is a lot of room.

title: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 5 Carrer de la Generalitat
title_short: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 5 Carrer de la Generalitat
description: Free land parquing next to a school, with a nice "terrace" with views of part of the town and its mountains that surround it. We spent a Saturday afternoon and night without problems, there was no more ac, only a tourist and us. Very calm and pleasant atmosphere. Without services, but perfect for overnight. Half of the terrain is leveled, the other half with a sensitive slope. Few places for ac. There is a water fountain nearby. Access to the town and its shops walking, very close. Beach a few kms, 15 minutes approx by car.

title: (17451) Sant Feliu de Buixalleu - 9 Carrer del Ter
title_short: (17451) Sant Feliu de Buixalleu - 9 Carrer del Ter
description: In an industrial area of ​​large vacant land, flat. I stayed 5 days to visit the area, excellent place, the private police runs all night, they are very nice, a little beer fixes things well.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
description: Free parking near the sea with water views.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 5 Lloc Sud-r 5
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 5 Lloc Sud-r 5
description: Parking next to the supermarket, self-service laundry, pharmacy, agrobotiga with sale of gas and food for pets. Also gas station off the highway.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
description: Spot in height next to a church (which does not ring). Very calm. A few young people in the evening but very discreet. A few dog walkers. We spent one night there with no problem.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 41 Passeig Misericòrdia
description: Drinking fountain with high flow

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 48 Avinguda Sant Jordi
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 48 Avinguda Sant Jordi
description: Econet Self-Service Laundry. Open from 7:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. 1 Washer of 10Kg 2 Washers of 15Kg 1 Washer of 19Kg 2 Dryers of 17Kg Payment in cash, bank card, and customer card. Vending coffee and drinks.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Camí de Montnegre a Hortsavinyà
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - Camí de Montnegre a Hortsavinyà
description: Dirt road for 20 minutes but accessible by 4x4. A magnificent view and quiet. A lot of hiking to do.

name: Galp
title: (17412) Galp
description: Autogas and petrolstation GALP

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
description: Mirador de la Creu, ideal place after a day spent on the beach and a night spent in the forest in silence. During the day, there are movements of cars, motorcycles and people coming to walk. Without services. Driving skills are required to access the track. Steep slope of the earth. Better 4x4. I climbed the wheel with the Kangoo several times.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar -
description:
Nice place in the middle of the pines, magnificent view, a little passage of walkers in the morning, but otherwise the place is very quiet !!
Attention, a high car is highly recommended (our Toyota Rav4 was perfect for climbing the steep and bumpy paths)

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Avinguda Torderola
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 2 Avinguda Torderola
description: Ground parking behind the Bonpreu.

name: Vila Village
title: (17451) Vila Village
description: Camping and sports complex with Bar Restaurant. Padel, tennis, petanque, swimming pools, picnic area, playground.

title: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 12 Avinguda Torderola
title_short: (17412) Maçanet de la Selva - 12 Avinguda Torderola
description: For all types of domestic vehicles up to 12 meters long (8 places) and also 8 other places for short or normal length vehicles up to approx. 8 meters. Self-service laundry, supermarket and gas station with LPG next door. In a very welcoming city. Ideal for AP7 travelers to rest for a few days during a long trip. A charming town with lots of history. The rules of your stay are written on a large sign at the entrance: No camping behavior (no chairs/tables/awning), stay 72 hours maximum, keep your pitches and be considerate. But free stay plus electricity 16A, as much as you need, water payable. All newly done, with small trees and benches. A safe place, quiet at night and well lit.

title: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 4 Camí de Can Preses
title_short: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 4 Camí de Can Preses
description: Esplanade next to the municipal sports hall. Skating rink, pin pon, picnic tables and swings

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Zona Càmping Tossa
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Zona Càmping Tossa
description:
Esplanade above the campsite. We came at night and were able to spend the night and have lunch the next day. It is not a dream place, but you can sleep peacefully.
Only one car passed all night.
There's too much light.

name: Camping Cala Llevado
title: (17320) Camping Cala Llevado
description: Tossa de Mar, 10B Urbanització Cala Llevadó. Camping Cala Llevado. Entirely built on the slope but straight terrain. Clean, nice fairly upscale pool. Very beautiful beaches at the bottom 5 mins walk. For the price and the view, I recommend.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 35 Carrer Maçanet
description:
***For reasons connected with the local Vidredes 2023 celebrations, the motorhome park will be closed from 25 August to 12 September ***. 


Ample car park where you can spend the night with water loading and black and gray water emptying services. Located near the center and the municipal sports hall. Starting point for excursions and with walking access to the various shops in the town.

name: Càmping Victòria
title: (08360) Càmping Victòria
description: Warm campsite, the staff is friendly, the camper pitches are removed from the center of the campsite with reserved access, the toilets are nearby for the pitches, the restaurant is not bad either, it's up to you

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 39 Diseminado Afores
description: Quiet area, we stopped to eat but we think it could be a good place to spend the night.

title: (17411) Vidreres - Passatge Oriente
description: Ground parking at the edge of a field. Calm in small town.

title: (17411) Vidreres - 120 Carrer Orient
description: Parking 200m from the center and starting point of several excursions.

name: Camping Marcos
title: (08350) Camping Marcos
description: Clean and well maintained family run campsite.

name: Càmping El Toro Azul
title: (08360) Càmping El Toro Azul
description:
Canet de Mar, 3 N-2.
El Toro Azul family campsite. At the foot of the beach, 1 km walk from the train to reach Barcelona.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description:
Petit lieu parfait pour un van. nous étions en T6. prenez le chemin en terre et passez le tout petit ruisseau.. il y a la place pour un seul van. 
bien à l abris des regards mais encore proche de la route.. donc un peu bruyant à partir de 6h...

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - Unnamed Road
description: It is next to the road, it is not very level, but there is shade and no one bothers you. It is not for camping, but to rest for a while, yes.

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
description: Beautiful place overlooking the port of Arenys de Mar. In the middle of an urbanization but with incredible views of the sea. Less than 1 km from all services for ac.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - GI-681
description: Next to the road, but you can drive all the way to the back, then you can hardly see the camper. Only stopped here for lunch, but there are no prohibition signs - you could certainly spend a good night here on the onward journey. Unfortunately a lot of rubbish.

title: (17451) Can Cadell - Placa Catalunya 1
description: Small esplanade of grass. It is the parking lot for the hiking routes, but it is not very crowded, the routes are not very special and the monument is quite far from this point.

title: (17240) Llagostera -
description: Magnificent location very isolated in the middle of the forest (alone in the world). A magnificent view of the sea and its sunrise and on the other side a view of the mountains and its sunset. Very accessible places we went there with our heavy weight (be careful it climbs). The place can accommodate a heavy pea or two vans.

title: (17451) Can Cadell -
description: Small quiet corner ideal for parking in peace, suitable for small and medium vehicles.

name: TurisMar Camping
title: (17320) TurisMar Camping
description: You haven't hot shower??‍♀️

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 19 Carrer Rial de Can Bellsolell
title_short: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 19 Carrer Rial de Can Bellsolell
description: Parking in earth, without slope, day and night, free. On one side there is no time limit and in the other, you have to put a ticket but without paying

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 1 Carrer Miramar
description: Ample parking. like many car parks in Spain if you arrive before the doorman and leave after him you will not pay anything. Shade in the motorhome area clinging to the mountain in the morning, dirt parking, sun next to the car area... Ignoring the misplaced GPS location forces you to make a detour. Follow the P1 parking instructions from Google Maps itself. You have to pass between the Skate Park and the Bus Parking to access the 1-lane road. View photos from Google Maps

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 8 Carrer Josep Irla
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 8 Carrer Josep Irla
description: Drinking water fountain, in the corner of the playground.

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 5 C-61
description: Larger gravel parking lot with no height limit and relatively flat overall. The street next door can be heard too clearly. Day and night camping is allowed at this location according to local police.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Carrer Francesc Macià
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Carrer Francesc Macià
description: Free parking out of season, near center. Great walk. Toilet at the bus station.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 52 Carrer la Guàrdia
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 52 Carrer la Guàrdia
description: Paid parking. The night 14 e. 7 on the day. 10 min from town.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Calle Vinya del Pla
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Calle Vinya del Pla
description: Perfect place without noise and accessible for all types of motorhomes.

title: (17410) Sils - Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n
title_short: (17410) Sils - Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n
description: Sils is a village located at the center of la Selva and its known mostly for its Estany. The motorhome area can be found in a really quiet place, in a unique environment.

address.street: Aparcament de l'estació de tren, s/n

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Parking next to the supermarket slat without services and very central

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 23 Avinguda Pelegrí
description: Public parking opposite the local police (tranquility assured) suitable for fitted van. Paying from 10h to 21h.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 GI-681
description: Drinking water at the Bp pump

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias
title_short: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias
description: Battery parking near the park and lake of Jalpi

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
description: It is the end of a street in the Arenys de Munt urbanization, you can sleep peacefully, there is shade and silence

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
description: Dirt road with few places to park but in August it is difficult to find free parking areas for campers

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Creixams
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Creixams
description: Laundry open 365 days

title: (17404) Riells i Viabrea - 11 Carrer Morou
description: Parking with approximately 30 spaces with a public bathroom that can get you out of an emergency

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 28D Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 28D Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Parking near the basketball court, near the city center! Quiet night, just the squealing seagulls and at 8am the bell of the school that rings, at 9am a little music at school, the evening children come to play a little ball but not disturbing. Convenient, it can be accessed by 2 entrances

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
description: Large car park that can accommodate about 40 vehicles to park and to visit Tossa de Mar. The beach and the historic center can be reached in 10 minutes.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 10 Avinguda de Ferràn Agulló
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 10 Avinguda de Ferràn Agulló
description: It is one of the widest streets, it is a blue zone that does not work in winter, ideal as it is close to everything, the only drawback is that trucks and service machinery continually pass by.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 18 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 18 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Residential street next to some tennis courts. Quiet for a night, little noise after 22:00, but enough to sleep. 1.4 km from the walls, 0.5 from a supermarket, and very central. There is no prohibition sign and no one has bothered us. Normally there is always a lot of free space. Perfect for 7.5 meter AC.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 19 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 19 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Large parking, lots of space we were alone in May, very pleasant to sit and eat with a view of the forest. Very good exposure for solar panels.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 6 Avinguda Costa Brava
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 6 Avinguda Costa Brava
description: Self-service laundry

name: Càmping Can Martí
title: (17320) Càmping Can Martí
description: Tossa de Mar, 1 Passatge Càmping C Martí. Nice campsite and close to town center and beach

title: (08476) Sant Celoni - 5 Carretera Nova
description: Behind the Repsol petrol station in La Batllòria, the Condis supermarket is next door. Large unpaved esplanade, quiet place. There is a toilet at the gas station. The front bar opens at 05:00. Pharmacy nearby.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 30 Avinguda Joan Maragall
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 30 Avinguda Joan Maragall
description: Paid parking from 10h to 22h, small places but one or two at the bottom of the car park, the only one to welcome us in Tossa. The free, was full

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 25 Carrer Barcelona
description: Parking possible for motorhomes in the city center.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Quiet place above Tossa de Mar with little sea view. Flat place on a bend in a road with very little traffic (no cars seen). In the morning some hikers and mountain bikers come by. Access via sand/gravel road with a few potholes, but definitely driveable with a van. A 4×4 is only helpful further up. Space for 1-2 cars.

name: Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
title: (17421) Càmping Riudarenes S.L.
description: Camping Riudarenes, simple place. Mainly permanent campers, few places for tourists. The full weekend, empty by the week. For motorhome about 7m difficult due to the size of the space. Sanitary facilities mostly old, cleanliness could be improved, hot water. Wireless. Bar on weekends Pool, currently not in operation. Wash / dry. Very friendly owner. To the mountain bike routes in the Santa Coloma area, approximately 5-6 km of driving on unpaved roads. Place far enough away from the square. Access by unpaved road but easy to drive. Dogs allowed

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Ramon Reig
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Ramon Reig
description: Very central Tossa de Mar, a few meters from the beach, dropping downhill, very quiet and without problem, a vehicle skipped at night passes, since the road is stuck, but at night there is no traffic, good place to sleep, in a van, a small slope, a few meters up there was a caravan in the small piece of esplanade that there was, not to camp.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
description: watch out for bad roads and get very slippery when it rains

title: (17410) Sils - 23A Carretera Sta Coloma-palamos
description: Restaurant Parking without facilities - near a Consum supermarket and a gas station. Near the airport. We only stayed and are soon back, but very quiet night without surprises

title: (17455) Caldes de Malavella - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of a pine forest, along a dirt road accessible to vehicles. Quiet. Respect nature!

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 47 Diseminado Afueras
description: Parking on the ground with a view of Tossa

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - 178 Urbanització Cal Batlle
description: Along a little frequented path, at the top of a climb, a small site for one or two motorhomes. Quiet, almost flat.
